Stages.Text: Jar'la, the local alchemist, has tasked you with acquiring stomach fluids somehow. It won't be easy to obtain such a thing unscathed, but the old lizard promised a good reward.
You managed to obtain the requested stomach fluids as instructed. Return to Jar'la in North Finmer.
You delivered the vial to Jar'la in North Finmer. He told you to return a day later to collect your reward.
